import React, { Component } from 'react'; const fetch = require('isomorphic-fetch'); import Flickity from 'react-flickity-component'; import Router from 'next/router'; const moment = require('moment'); const flickityOptions = { initialIndex: 0, accessibility: true, pageDots: false, wrapAround: true } class UpcomingEvent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { productsGet: [] }; } componentDidMount() { let id = Router.query.id; let splitData = id.split('-'); var query = ` query { products{ id, product_name, product_introduction, product_hours, product_type{ id, product_type }, product_date, product_start_time, product_end_time, product_total_seats, product_remain_seats, product_event_map, product_slug product_media{ url, name } } } `; var variables = { "id": Number(splitData[0]) } fetch(process.env.GRAPHURL, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ query, variables }), }) .then(response => response.json()) .then((response) => { let getProductDataFilter = response.data.products; let products = getProductDataFilter.filter((item) => { if (item.product_type != null) { var currentTime = moment(new Date()).format('YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') var eventTime = item.product_date + ' ' + item.product_start_time; eventTime = moment(eventTime).format('YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss'); return (item.product_type.product_type === 'Event') && (item.product_slug !== splitData[1] + '-' + splitData[2]) && (currentTime < eventTime) } }) this.setState({ productsGet: products }); }); //console.log(homeBannerData); } render() { const { productsGet } = this.state; return ( <>

Upcoming events

{ productsGet.length > 0 ? ( { productsGet.map((event, index) => { return (

{event.product_name ? event.product_name : '-'}

Date

{event.product_date ? moment(event.product_date).format("DD") : '-'} {event.product_date ? moment(event.product_date).format("MMM") : '-'}

Starts at

{event.product_start_time ? moment(event.product_start_time, 'hh:mm:ss').format("h") : '-'} {event.product_start_time ? moment(event.product_start_time, 'hh:mm:ss').format("A") : '-'}

Seats left

{event.product_remain_seats ? event.product_remain_seats : '-'} /{event.product_total_seats ? event.product_total_seats : '-'}

Ends at

{event.product_end_time ? moment(event.product_end_time, 'hh:mm:ss').format("h") : '-'} {event.product_end_time ? moment(event.product_end_time, 'hh:mm:ss').format("A") : '-'}

{/*

) }) } ) : '' }
